subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets scored only one run for the third straight game, and they lost when Scott Hairston led off the 10th inning with a home run. The Padres have won their last four games by the same score.
snippet: The Mets scored only one run for the third straight game, and they lost when Scott Hairston led off the 10th inning with a home run. The Padres have won their last four games by the same score.
